texts: I build websites on a daily basis

texts.text: In the last few years I've been building websites. Mostly very unique and design-focused WordPress sites, so I consider myself a front-end dev, even though I did the full stack. Maybe even a CSS ninja.

On the front-end I usually use SASS and custom styles, but I have no problem using <insert CSS framework>. Also I fell in love with Javascipt and the closest to my heart is React and Redux, but I like to experiment a lot.
On the back-end besides WordPress I fiddled the most with Laravel and some with Go.
I consider my biggest strength the ability to learn new things fast and I very much enjoy it as well.
In my free time I like playing games - computer and board, watching TV series / movies, traveling and drinking beer. I live with my girlfriend and we have a black cat.
